title: Pixel 3a XL Screen wake issue
content:
Hi, I wondered if anyone had seen this issue before?
When waking the screen it flickers with what looks like a commodore 64 loading screen. Phone is extremely slow to respond and it can only be fixed by a forced reboot, just for the issue to return when the screen sleeps and awakes once more.
I've tried:
Safe Mode
Factory reset
Praying
Hours of googling
Offering one of my children

Video here, the phone is unusable really. It's like being back in the 2004 and I simply don't like it. I think there's some hardware issue here, but hoping someone knows exactly what to do and I don't have to pain a warranty return.

Many thanks

Andrew
